ygData.subject: SK sword akin to Soulfire?
ygData.msgSnippet: Just wondering, since presumably the Dark Reaver is our counterpart to Ghoulbane, if any quest or loot obtainable SK sword akin to Soulfire has been found, or
ygData.messageBody:
Just wondering, since presumably the Dark Reaver is our counterpart
to Ghoulbane, if any quest or loot obtainable SK sword akin to Soulfire
has been found, or any rumors/ideas about this?

Soulfire is just too cool looking, and an excellent weapon to boot.
I guess what I really want is a long term quest that isn't broken,
and you don't have to be an enchanter to do =)

I hail my entire guild every time I'm in Neriak, and am trying to
get faction with the Blood Sabres and Freeport SK guild, but I'm still
at a loss for quests, and camping is getting really boring.

Xilith
